channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why escalating Middle East tensions haven’t kept the stock market from climbing
China markets start like a lion and end like a lamb after Beijing stimulus comes up short
item.description: Shares in mainland China soared at the opening, as markets reopened after the Golden Week holidays. But they slid back as the stimulus plans provided ...

item.title: Why Trump’s tariffs would hit poor and middle-class Americans hardest
Former Humane execs secure $25 million valuation after departing AI hardware startup
item.description: Two former Humane executives have raised $4 million in seed funding for Infactory, their new AI venture, at a $25 million valuation.

item.title: Hong Kong stocks close over 9% lower after disappointment on China stimulus
Tampa Bay hasn’t been hit directly by a major hurricane since 1921. Milton may be the one
item.description: Florida's Gulf Coast braced Tuesday for the impact of Hurricane Milton's winds and expected massive storm surge.

item.title: Saudi Arabia's PIF cuts stake in Nintendo after report said it was considering increase
item.description: The PIF reduced its stakehold in the Japanese video game giant to 7.54% from 8.58% previously, according to a Japanese regulatory filing.

item.title: How to win the unfinished fight against cost-of-living shocks
item.description: The bottom line is that every government ought to be thinking about how to do better the next time.

item.title: Kugler says speed of normalization of rates to depend on employment, inflation
S&P's Dan Yergin warns of 'dangerous time' for global economy as Middle East tensions fester
item.description: The global economy is staring at a "dangerous time" like never before as Middle East tensions remain elevated, said S&P Global's vice chairman Daniel ...

item.title: More rich people are using ‘secret’ trusts and LLCs to hide money from their spouses
item.description: Secret trusts and LLCs are increasingly common ways wealthy people are shielding assets in divorce.

item.title: Uber gives users option to only hail full-electric vehicles, launches AI chatbot for the EV-curious
item.description: Uber announced a spate of fresh measures to update its sustainability features globally, including an "EV preference" for ride-hailers .

item.title: Spotify’s HR chief says remote staff aren’t ‘children’ as company reaffirms work-from-anywhere policy
item.description: Spotify isn't planning to follow Amazon and scrap its "work from anywhere" policy, but its HR chief admitted remote work isn't ideal.

item.title: Why embracing regret is the best decision you can make in the age of ‘radical uncertainty’
item.description: 68% of people say they are finding it hard to plan for the future.

item.title: Fed’s Musalem says going slow on interest-rate cuts makes sense
